SELECT ROWNUM, SORT.* FROM (SELECT FREEBOARD_NO, BOARD_TYPE, TITLE, M.U_NAME, POST_DATE FROM COMM_FREEBOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.UNO = M.UNO)
UNION ALL
SELECT COMPANION_NO, BOARD_TYPE, CONTENT, M.U_NAME, POST_DATE FROM COMM_COMPANION C JOIN MEMBER M ON (C.UNO = M.UNO)) SORT WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 8 ORDER BY POST_DATE DESC

SELECT B.TITLE, B.ADDR1, B.CONTENTTYPEID, B.FIRSTIMAGE, test.* FROM (SELECT CONTENTID, COUNT(CONTENTID) AS LIKE_COUNT FROM TOUR_LIKE GROUP BY CONTENTID ORDER BY LIKE_COUNT DESC) test, BASIC_TOUR_INFO B WHERE B.CONTENTID = test.CONTENTID

SELECT * FROM (SELECT B.CONTENTID, B.CONTENTTYPEID, B.TITLE, B.FIRSTIMAGE, E.EVENTENDDATE, E.EVENTSTARTDATE FROM DETAIL_EVENT E, BASIC_TOUR_INFO B WHERE B.CONTENTTYPEID = 15 ORDER BY E.EVENTSTARTDATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4
